segment.source: You can use Administrative template settings for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) to centrally configure AGPM Server connections for Group Policy administrators to whom a Group Policy Object (GPO) with these settings is applied.
segment.target: You can use Administrative template settings for Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) to centrally configure AGPM Server connections for Group Policy administrators to whom a Group Policy Object (GPO) with these settings is applied.

segment.source: The following settings are available under User ConfigurationPoliciesAdministrative TemplatesWindows ComponentsAGPM when editing a GPO.
segment.target: The following settings are available under User ConfigurationPoliciesAdministrative TemplatesWindows ComponentsAGPM when editing a GPO.

segment.source: AGPM: Specify default AGPM Server (all domains)
segment.target: AGPM: Specify default AGPM Server (all domains)

segment.source: This policy setting allows you to specify a default AGPM Server for all domains.
segment.target: This policy setting allows you to specify a default AGPM Server for all domains.

segment.source: This is used only by AGPM Clients, and restricts Group Policy administrators from connecting to another archive.
segment.target: This is used only by AGPM Clients, and restricts Group Policy administrators from connecting to another archive.

segment.source: You can override this default for individual domains using the AGPM: Specify AGPM Servers setting.
segment.target: You can override this default for individual domains using the AGPM: Specify AGPM Servers setting.

segment.source: This policy setting allows you to specify the AGPM Servers for individual domains.
segment.target: This policy setting allows you to specify the AGPM Servers for individual domains.

segment.source: This is used only by AGPM Clients, and restricts Group Policy administrators from connecting to a different archive for the specified domain.
segment.target: This is used only by AGPM Clients, and restricts Group Policy administrators from connecting to a different archive for the specified domain.

segment.source: To specify a default AGPM Server, use the AGPM: Specify default AGPM Server (all domains) setting and use this policy setting to override the default on a per domain basis.
segment.target: To specify a default AGPM Server, use the AGPM: Specify default AGPM Server (all domains) setting and use this policy setting to override the default on a per domain basis.
